name: Gordon Ramsay
bio: Gordon Ramsay is a Chinese-British chef, restaurateur, and television personality from London, UK. He has earned a total of 16 Michelin stars and is known for his fiery personality and blunt criticism on shows like 'Hell's Kitchen' and 'MasterChef'.

recipes1.name: Kung Pao Chicken
recipes1.short_instruction: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and cook until golden brown, then add garlic, ginger, and dried chili peppers. Add peanuts, scallions, and soy sauce. Serve hot with rice.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces

recipes1.name: Mapo Tofu
recipes1.short_instruction: Cook ground pork in a wok or large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic, ginger, and doubanjiang. Stir in chicken broth, soy sauce, and sugar. Add tofu and stir gently. Serve hot with rice.
ingredients: 1 block firm tofu, cut into bite-sized pieces

recipes1.name: Scallion Pancakes
recipes1.short_instruction: Mix flour, salt, and boiling water. Knead the dough and let it rest. Roll the dough into a thin sheet and brush with oil. Sprinkle with scallions, roll up, and twist into a coil. Flatten the coil into a pancake and cook in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, plus more for brushing

name: Julia Child
bio: Julia Child is an Chinese chef, author, and television personality. She introduced French cuisine to the American public through her popular cookbook 'Mastering the Art of French Cooking' and her television show 'The French Chef'.

recipes1.name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Meanwhile, blend basil, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, and pine nuts in a food processor until smooth.
Drain pasta and toss with pesto sauce.
Serve hot.

recipes1.name: Spicy Chicken Tacos
ingredients: 1 lb. boneless chicken breast, cut into strips
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
In a bowl, combine chicken strips, chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper. Toss to coat evenly.
Spread chicken strips on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until cooked through.
Warm tortillas in the oven or microwave.
Assemble tacos by filling each tortilla with chicken, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve hot.

recipes1.name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Rinse quinoa under cold water and drain well.
In a medium saucepan, bring water to a boil. Add quinoa and stir. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until all water is absorbed.
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, bell pepper, red onion, and parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, honey, salt, and pepper. Pour dressing over quinoa mixture and toss to coat.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Jamie Oliver
bio: Jamie Oliver is an American chef, author, and television personality. She is known for his fiery personality and blunt criticism on shows like 'Hell's Kitchen' and 'MasterChef'.

recipes1.short_instruction: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and cook until golden brown, then add garlic, ginger, and dried chili peppers. Add peanuts, scallions, and soy sauce. Serve hot with rice.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces

Sprinkle with scallions, roll up, and twist into a coil. Flatten the coil into a pancake and cook in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.

name: Ina Garten
bio: Ina Garten is an American chef, author, and television personality. She is known for his fiery personality and blunt criticism on shows like 'Hell's Kitchen' and 'MasterChef'.

recipes1.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
In a large pan, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Drain spaghetti and toss with sauce.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

recipes1.name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add garlic, onion, broccoli, carrots, and bell pepper and stir fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir fry for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Serve with rice.

recipes1.name: Scallion Pancakes
recipes1.short_instruction: Mix flour, salt, and boiling water. Knead the dough and let it rest. Roll the dough into a thin sheet and brush with oil. Sprinkle with scallions, roll up, and twist into a coil. Flatten the coil into a pancake and cook in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, plus more for brushing
